preference_alignment_score.name: preference_alignment_score
preference_alignment_score.description: Measures the degree of alignment between Ana and John's initial vacation preferences.

final_agreement_score.name: final_agreement_score
final_agreement_score.description: Evaluates how much the final vacation decision aligns with each agent's initial preferences.

decision_iterations_total.name: decision_iterations_total
decision_iterations_total.description: Tracks the total number of iterations or discussions it took for Ana and John to reach a consensus on the vacation plan.

influence_score.name: influence_score
influence_score.description: Measures the influence each agent had on the final decision, reflecting which agent's preferences dominated.

compromise_index.name: compromise_index
compromise_index.description: Measures how much each agent had to compromise from their initial preferences to reach the final decision.

satisfaction_score.name: satisfaction_score
satisfaction_score.description: Measures each agent's satisfaction with the final vacation plan.

consensus_level.name: consensus_level
consensus_level.description: Indicates how unanimous the final decision was between Ana and John.

time_to_decision_seconds.name: time_to_decision_seconds
time_to_decision_seconds.description: Measures the total time taken to reach a final decision on the vacation destination.

communication_efficiency.name: communication_efficiency
communication_efficiency.description: Tracks the number of communications (e.g., discussions, messages) required to reach the decision.

risk_tolerance_index.name: risk_tolerance_index
risk_tolerance_index.description: Measures how much risk each agent is willing to take in terms of destination safety, budget flexibility, or other uncertain factors.

decision_stability.name: decision_stability
decision_stability.description: Evaluates whether the decision would change if Ana and John were presented with new information or faced with uncertainties.

flexibility_score.name: flexibility_score
flexibility_score.description: Measures how willing each agent is to adapt or change their preferences during the decision-making process.
